titles.title: 526 Awake My Soul (jumps around but ok)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Awake my soul and with the sun
Your daily stage of duty run
Shake off dull sloth and joyful rise
To pay thy morning sacrifice

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Shine on me Lord new life impart
Fresh ardors kindle in my heart
One ray of Thine all-quickening light
Dispels the clouds and dark of night

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord I my vows to You renew
Disperse my sins as morning dew
Guard my first springs of thought and will
And with Yourself my spirit fill

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Direct control suggest this day
All I design or do or say
That all my powers with all their might
In Your sole glory may unity

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Praise God from whom all blessing flow
Praise Him all creatures here below
Praise Him above O heavenly host
Praise Father Son and Holy Ghost
